page.title: 19Government, Law (Harberton)
page.content: The survey area comes mostly within the area of the parish of Harberton, which has two wards - Harberton and Harbertonford. The Parish council is made up of twelve people, six from each ward. Harberton parish council comes under the South Hams District Council. Law and order is not considered a problem by residents of the area, although many remarked that some credit must go to a policeman who lives in the village and although not a community officer for the area is very active in local life.
